mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from reviewBoard where postDisable = 0
mapper.update: update reviewBoard set tel = #{tel}, content = #{content}, place = #{place}, petName = #{petName}, petGender = #{petGender}, petType=#{petType}, petDate = #{petDate}, petImg = #{petImg}, petDetail = #{petDetail} where postId = #{postId}
update reviewBoard set postDisable = 1 where postId = #{postId}
update reviewBoard set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}
update reviewBoard set postreportcnt = postreportcnt + 1 where postId = #{value}
